blocks.name: opeliun2xp
blocks.content: Membership of an ordered pair in a union of Cartesian products over its second component, analogous to ~ opeliunxp . (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2019.)

thm mpt2exxg2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(cdm(c4), universe), wss(cdm(c4), ciun(s0, c0, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0))))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, cxp(c2, csn(cv(s0)))), universe))
